episodes.title: The Forgotten Town of Female Mass Murderers | Angel Makers & Doomsday Cults of the 1800s
episodes.description:
In this chilling episode of The Midnight Ledger Podcast, we dive deep into the dark and twisted history of three infamous 19th-century obsessions. We start with the unbelievable story of **The Angel Makers of Nagyrév**, a group of women who committed mass murder in a small, isolated town. This true crime saga is one of the most disturbing chapters in European history.

We then transition to the religious fervor of the 1800s, exploring **The Millerites**, a major Doomsday Cult whose prophecy for the end of the world failed, and the chaotic story of **Prophet Matthias** and his disruptive religious movement.

If you are fascinated by **forgotten true crime, historical cults, or dark history podcasts**, this episode will keep you listening!

🎧 Listen to more episodes of The Midnight Ledger for cinematic storytelling and the darkest corners of real history.
